Now you're thinking with portals
这确实是一款很经典很有新意的优秀游戏，但是每次刚开始的那个光头插阀门，看得我头皮发麻，特别恶心，还有游戏里那个背景机器人电音，也听得人特别不舒服，所以不好意思，我是个有强迫症的人，给差评

Ta gra pokazała ze 1 część możę być tak naprawde świetnym demem do 2. Świetny kalsyk z zabawnym humorem, znakomitą rozrywką, że tak sie wyraże minimalistyczną grafiką wiekszość gry to białe komory testowe, chociaż końcówka daje nam poznać placówke Aperture Sciene od innej strony. Przez większość gry towarzyszy na cisza, ale końcowy kawałek jest naprawde dobry. Portal to gra w którą powinnen zagrać każdy komu przypadają do gustu gry logiczne. Moja ocena tego świetnego choć krótkiego klasyka to 9/10. 

Cake is a lie

早就听别人推荐传送门这款游戏，也终于趁着打折，将传送门1和2一起归入库中。首先尽管这款游戏操作简单，但游戏一开始的教学真的很细心，刚入手的玩家一定能很容易上手这款游戏。
内部的关卡，设计的非常巧妙，玩起来也很有意思，会有一直玩下去的冲动。
作为一款被定义为解密类的游戏，的确很需要思考，但相对于真正的解密类游戏，还是不够纯粹，有些关卡还是需要你的操作，需要你鼠标操作灵活快速，这一点对于解密类的游戏就有些过了。
但总体来说，游戏不错，值得推荐。

Bardzo dobra gra, oryginalny pomysł i dodatkowo genialnie zrealizowany, oprócz tego ciekawa fabuła z elementami humorystycznymi, a tego chyba nikt nie spodziewał się w grze logicznej.

10/10 must have

It may be short, but if you love puzzle games and/or being antagonized by a sassy robot overlord, this is definitely the game for you.
muss man nichts zu sagen :D
Good short little game that you should definetly play. I like to call it a classic

Muito bom, os puzzles são muito divertidos e desafiadores, e a trilha sonora do final é muito boa, porém só se torna espetacular no 2. Aqui a trilha tenta passar um sentimento de solidão pra o jogdor. Se você quer um desafio mental, pode comprar, eu recomendo muito. O gráfico do game não é lá essas coisas, o jogo também é de 2007, e tem gente que só por isso, não recomenda o jogo. Joguem a demo ou baixem antes, se gostarem, comprem, vale a pena. O jogo só é um pouco curto, mas provavelmente deve ser pelo estresse de resolver as câmaras em uma primeira jogatina.

En orijinal bulmaca oyunlarındandır. Değişik bir FPS deneyimi. Ateş etmeden de savaşabilmek çok ilginç. Biraz kısa buldum oyunu. Hemen bitiyor. Gerçi Portal 2 de var.

Ormai questo gioco raggiunge prezzi bassisimi ma nonostante ciò ha una grafica gradevole anche confrontandolo al secondo e una storia un po' corta, in 1:30h riuscite a finire completamente la storia però se volete veramente godere di questo gioco DOVETE completare tutti gli achivement e questo vale anche per il secondo portal

Great Game, However For 6.99 (UKP) its not worth the price. wait for the sale or get the portal bundle.

But It is still a classic and incredibly good.
This game is so good and it is worth it if you dont belive me play the demo and i know you will like it

The first game that comes with The Orange Box set, Portal sets the bar for FPS with a puzzle twist. Even when playing this in 2018, the game still sets itself well. Getting all the achivements can be tricky, but even with the main storyline, it is intriguing.

Take the steam off you with a little light-hearted game, and you won't be disappointed!

Play this game!!!! It was a absolute blast to play and it had me laughing countless times. It is a short game but I actually liked the fact that it wasn’t long as a father of 2 I don’t get as much time to game and it was great to play a game and finish it within a couple hours. The mechanics are amazing they are fun to use and might even make you a little dizzy lol.... overall I would say this is a great experience and a must play for all pc gamers

Taklitleri,binlerce yıl önce sülfür elementinin Dünya atmosferini çarşaf edasıyla sarması gibi oyun alemini de bir dönem ''Beynimi hissedemiyorum abi!Ne kafa oyun.'' sözleriyle saran bu orjinal oyunu oynama fırsatını yakın bir zamanda buldum.Oyun aleminin oynanmadan geçilmemesi gereken,nadide güzel oyunlardan bir tanesiymiş.Karakter,hikaye,level dizaynı klişelerini güzel bir şekilde taşıyor ki 2018 de bile zevkli zaman geçirebiliyorsunuz.Tavsiye ederim.

Well- for 10 years old and not a flag product, it was fun. took me good hours to finish it and find all of those radios. Anyhow- worth buying, the sequel is even better and having this game is a good preperation for it.

Игра по большей части является технодемкой без какого-либо лихо закрученного сюжета и богатой постановки, но тем не менее эксперимент удался и в 2011 году мы уже получили сиквел Portal 2, который набрал в масштабе и качестве.


•Приходится думать логически.

•Нет этой так ненавистной подьездными бабками кровищи, зомби и оружия.

•Печалит малая продолжительность, но можно пройти дополнительные уровни, которые были в кампании с усложнёными условиями.

• Русская локализация 50 на 50.
Не постаралась студия локализации БУКА и сделала слишком противный голос ГЛаДОС, которым в игре вещают ещё турели и модули, из-за чего в финальной битве стоит полнейшая какофония из одних и тех же голосов.
Но даже не в этом проблема. Куда большей являются запоротые тайминги, вследствие чего фразы либо просто обрываются, либо монолог растягивается настолько, что например в самом начале портал открывается на секунд 10 раньше, чем ГЛаДОС успевает начать отсчёт к его открытию.
Но благо в Portal 2 они исправились. В плане именно перевода всё вполне неплохо в обоих частях.

• Желательно брать на распродаже со 2 частью, т.к. 249 рублей для такой короткой игры многовато.

Игра очень хорошая! Вначале конечно скучновато, но когда начинается побег, вот там она прямо затягивает и невозможно оторваться, но есть и минус:) Она короткая, у меня на ее прохождение вышло совсем мало времени, а если быть точным это час и 45 минут. 
Ребят, покупайте и играйте, не пожаляете!
Всем приятной игры!

portal was a great game i have a few things to say

good: 

the game was very enticing puzzle games  are often boring and unoriginal with no new ideas they can get very reppetative too but with portal that is not true wat so ever, while pleying i found the 3D puzzles very trying to solve while still having a want to continue. the game mixes story and intention (puzzle) perfectly while still including humour and easter eggs 

negative: 

i feel that portal 1 lacked new concepts during the game we saw an improvment to this in portal 2 with the lasers and the diffrent beams and gels, but in portal 1 it was mostly about getting this enegry ball from one place to another or a block from one place to another.
perfect

Portal took me by surprise, was expecting just a good puzzle game but got much more than that. 

Puzzles are good and progress nice in difficulty, the narrator is funny, witty and sarcastic which I enjoyed in between and during puzzle. The second half has a massive leap in quality but will not spoil anything, just get this game and experiece it. This game may be a must have in collection, and at this point it can be bought so cheap there is no excuse not to.
